column2: ggplot(aes(x = snap_insta, y = count_snap_insta, fill = snap_insta)) +
geom_text(aes(label = signif(proportion, digits = 3), vjust = -0.5,  hjust = 6)) + #adds the proportion on top of the bar graph, don't know how to format this as percentages?
labs(title = "Men and Women say NO to Instagram and Snapchat*", #is this title too strong?
subtitle = "*Well at least a large proportion of the ones who took this survey do", #thought he might find this funny lol
